name: The continent of The Fishmen (Lekasoft)
description:
Students project on our first ever  Game JAM in our school, ESA Games.

The theme of this Game JAM was : "Lovecraft"

We had inspiration on the movie "The Continent of the Fishmen".

It may feature a lot of bugs !

This game was made in 36 hours.

TEAM :

Alice "Amelyse" DONNET - Programmer, Animations

Kévin MOUTTE  - Game Design, Programmer

Théo  COLLET - Game Design, UI Design

Frédéric BREGAND - Character Design, Sprite Art

Jérôme BLAISE - Game Design, Character Design

Gabriel LOEFFLER - Environnement Art, Programmer
